titles.title: A bill to allow the Export-Import Bank to prepay obligations issued to the Federal Financing Bank without incurring prepayment penalties.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy.
Hearing Held by the Subcommittee on International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy Prior to Introduction (Feb 25, 88).

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

committee.subcommittee: International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy
committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Export-Import Bank of the United States

bill.summary: 3/9/1988--Introduced. Allows the Export-Import Bank to prepay obligations issued to the Federal Financing Bank between November 30, 1982, and January 1, 1988, without incurring prepayment penalties.
